name: MyPAINQuestionnaireCodes
title: MyPAIN Questionnaire Codes
description: Code system for questions from questionnaire used in MyPAIN and Pain Manager

concept.display: Please describe the location(s) of any pain you have had in the past 7 days (e.g., lower back and left hip)
In the  past 7 days - How intense was your pain at its worst?
In the  past 7 days - How intense was your average pain?
In the  past 7 days - What is your level of pain right now?
In the  past 7 days - How much did pain interfere with your day to day activities?
In the  past 7 days - How much did pain interfere with your work?
In the  past 7 days - How much did pain interfere with your ability to participate in social activities?
In the  past 7 days - How much did pain interfere with your household chores?
How often have Exercises at home (such as those assigned by a therapist) or outside (such as walking, jogging, swimming) you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often have Sleep positioners or devices (such as additional pillows, padding, etc.) you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Stretching you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Weight loss or changes in your diet you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Setting and reaching activity goals you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Ice or heat therapy you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Physical therapy you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Acupuncture you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Chiropractic treatment you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?

How often have Pain relievers (such as Advil, Aleve, Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Motrin, Tylenol) you can buy without a prescription from your doctor that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
How often have Herbal or nutritional pain relievers (such as ginseng or kava kava) that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
How often have Cremes, lotions, gels or patches applied to the skin (for example Bengay, Tiger Balm or BioFreeze) that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
How often have prescription Opioid medications (such as hydrocodone, oxycodone, codeine, morphine and fentanyl) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have prescription Cortisone injections (a shot to relieve inflammation) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have prescription Non-opioid medications as prescribed by a doctor (such as Celebrex, Cymbalta) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Yoga helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Massage helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Meditation helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Relaxation or mindfulness-based training helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Group or individual therapy for pain helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Acceptance and commitment therapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Sleep management (such as a sleep study or CPAP) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Aromatherapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have Crystals helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have Essential oils helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Music therapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
Have you tried any Other new treatments to help with your pain in the last 6 months? Please describe

What are the biggest barriers to achieving your activity goals? For example: I have a lot of stress from work which makes my pain worse.
